title: Understanding DEC
text: The DEC stands for the Division for Early Childhood, which is part of the Council for Exceptional Children. It focuses on young children with developmental delays or disabilities.

title: Purpose of DEC
text: The DEC provides recommended practices to improve learning outcomes for young children who have or are at risk for developmental delays or disabilities.

hintAnswer: recommended practices designed to help improve the learning outcomes of young children who have or who are $$at-risk$$ for developmental delays or disabilities
title: Identifying DEC's Role
text: What is the primary role of the DEC?
choices: council for the accreditation of educator preparation
standards which encompass a wide range of ethics, standards, and practices created to help guide those who have taken on the crucial role of educating students with disabilities
recommended practices designed to help improve the learning outcomes of young children who have or who are $$at-risk$$ for developmental delays or disabilities
